reference.title: consequence
reference.shortdesc: The <consequence> element specifies the consequence of failing to avoid a hazard, for example, "Contact may cause burn."

section.title: Contains
section.p: The content model of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

section.title: Contained By
section.p: The parents of this element may differ based on where it is used. Content model information is located here:

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <hazardstatement type="warning"> <messagepanel> <typeofhazard>Hot surfaces inside.</typeofhazard> <consequence>Contact may cause burn.</consequence> <howtoavoid>Wear protective gear before servicing internal parts.</howtoavoid> </messagepanel> <hazardsymbol href="hotsurface.png"></hazardsymbol> </hazardstatement>
